reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's pattern, describing it as really cute. The size receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting that the arms are shorter than full length.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compliments Galore. Gorgeous!
items.body: New fave oversized sweater. Fabric soft to touch, comfortable. Cozy warm & wow factor undeniable. Worn to work, weekend wear, so comfy at home! Size M, usually a S-. This oversized style works easily into petite wardrobe. Buy now! Compliments await. Read more
items.author: Dawn Yoga

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little out of porportion
items.body: Looks adorable. body is bigger and Arms are shorter than full length and not quite 3/4. But really cute pattern. Read more
items.author: Dianne Parady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars More cropped than I expected.
items.body: My only complaint is that I wish it were longer. Read more
items.author: V. Waters

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice warm cardigan with a fun “print”
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I’m keeping my new sweater cardigan for sure because it’s very soft and comfy. I love the color combo and I think it will go nicely with the rest of my wardrobe. I wish the price point would be somewhere around $30-35. Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute sweater.
items.body: good buy for the price. super cute sweater. decent fabric. only down is it is a bit short, almost cropped. But i am short waisted so it isn't horrible for me. have not washed it yet. sure hope it holds up. Read more
items.author: Amanda Harris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy Western Style That Matches the Photos Perfectly
items.body: This cowgirl-print cardigan turned out to be exactly what we hoped for which is great quality, true-to-photo design, and surprisingly warm without feeling bulky. The knit is a nice medium thickness with clean jacquard detailing and no loose threads or frays. After a couple of washes (gentle cycle with a laundry bag), it held its shape and the colors stayed sharp, which immediately sets it apart from cheaper novelty prints. The Western graphics look bold in person, and the symmetry across the front and sleeves gives it a polished, intentional look. The fabric blend is soft and comfortable for all-day wear, making it perfect for chilly fall or winter days. Pairing it with jeans and boots really brings out that "cowboy chic" vibe and great for country concerts, Nashville trips, or just adding a little Western flair to a casual outfit. Overall, it’s a well made, stylish piece that feels worth every penny. Read more
items.author: ConquerComputers

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unclear graphics.
items.body: The graphics were unclear so I returned it. Read more
items.author: belinda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovey, well made, Western/Cowgirl/Agriculture Sweater!
items.body: Beautiful, well made horse sweater! I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this sweater! The colors are separate, which is great - sometimes the colors of a sweater bleed into each other! The knitting is even. It isn't heavy-weight, but it's not cheaply lightweight either. It is perfect for Fall and early Spring, and perfect for winter with layering. It's also great for cooler summer evenings! The buttons are on the sweater securely and the buttonholes are not cheaply placed! It is very soft and warm! Comfortable to wear! And the sizing is spot on! My grandchildren live on a ranch and they are involved in many agriculture projects. This sweater is perfect - it is difficult to find agriculture-centered clothing. I am not sure of how this launders yet, as they have not laundered the sweater. But the sweater is well made - no loose threads or sloppy seams. The sweater feels durable, so I think that it will launder well. We always hang our clothes to dry, as this insures less shrinkage and keeps clothing looking newer for longer! I HIGHLY recommend this beautiful Western/Cowgirl/Agriculture sweater! It is lovely and exceeds expectation!! Photos to be added later. Read more
items.author: Blonda

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 01_khaki, 02_brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
